Title: What If You Could Start Over?
Plot:
Matthew, James and Tina meet and take a bungy ride together, but something happens, and they land in a street scene frozen in time. Freaked out, they gradually realise it is a split second before the ambulance crash occurs. James believes it is his doing - but why here, why now? Matthew is convinced it's because they can change what happened - stop the crash happening, and he won't die.
Tina tells him that the Golden Egg ticket he's carrying is a winner. Matthew doesn't want it, he just wants to
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
